func.title: SetVertexXY

param.name: xpos
param.desc: Desired X offset of the vertex.

param.name: ypos
param.desc: Desired Y offset of the vertex.

func.desc: Sets both X and Y position of a vertex.
func.remark: Notice: with any vertex updated caused by stretching or rotation of the object (e.g. building or growth) the vertices will be reset to their original defined position unless a special vertex mode is selected.

example.text: Sets the third vertex of the first clonk of the first player to -5/-10.
